justification: “We developed a novel extension of a validated, gamified two-step decision-making task … Using computational modelling, we were able to extract a measure of model-basedness for each individual.”
“We also replicated prior findings using the original Cannon Blast ‘two-step’ task … finding a reduction in model-basedness associated with compulsivity and intrusive thought.”
“State depression … was measured using the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) … We observed a positive relationship between depressive symptoms … measured using the PHQ-8.”
“21.05% … scored above established cut-offs for clinically-relevant symptom severity for anxiety (GAD-7)… In addition, we measured state … anxiety using the … GAD-7.”

measured_by: subset of questionnaire items entered into computational factor modelling
justification: “We measured three transdiagnostic factors … Following our prior work, we used a subset of items from the original measures to predict the true scores.”
construct: transdiagnostic dimensions (anxious-depression, compulsivity & intrusive thought, social withdrawal)
